name: Ice Hockey - Hat Trick - Match 3 - Prototype
name_original: Ice Hockey - Hat Trick - Match 3 - Prototype
description:
Prototype: HTML5: 10 minutes of play only one level. Status: Playable
Prototype: Android: 10 minutes of play only one level. Status: Playable

Summary: Ice Hockey Themed Connect 3 Game includes unlimited levels, randomly generated boards. The goal of the game is to earn the most points by connecting the most items in a row. This game will allow students to earn game coins to use to upgrade their player characters in the other games in the same suite.

    --- Ice Hockey Suite ---
